00001                                 /* Sparse triangular numeric matrices */
00002 #include "dtCMatrix.h"
00003 #include "cs_utils.h"
00004 
00005 #define RETURN(_CH_)   UNPROTECT(1); return (_CH_);
00006 
00007 /* This is used for *BOTH* triangular and symmetric Csparse: */
00008 SEXP tCMatrix_validate(SEXP x)
00009 {
00010     SEXP val = xCMatrix_validate(x);/* checks x slot */
00011     if(isString(val))
00012         return(val);
00013     else {
00014         SEXP
00015             islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym),
00016             pslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym);
00017         int uploT = (*uplo_P(x) == 'U'),
00018             k, nnz = length(islot),
00019             *xi = INTEGER(islot),
00020             *xj = INTEGER(PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, nnz)));
00021 
00022         expand_cmprPt(length(pslot) - 1, INTEGER(pslot), xj);
00023 
00024         /* Maybe FIXME: ">" should be ">="      for diag = 'U' (uplo = 'U') */
00025         if(uploT) {
00026             for (k = 0; k < nnz; k++)
00027                 if(xi[k] > xj[k]) {
00028                     RETURN(mkString(_("uplo='U' must not have sparse entries in lower diagonal")));
00029                 }
00030         }
00031         else {
00032             for (k = 0; k < nnz; k++)
00033                 if(xi[k] < xj[k]) {
00034                     RETURN(mkString(_("uplo='L' must not have sparse entries in upper diagonal")));
00035                 }
00036         }
00037 
00038         RETURN(ScalarLogical(1));
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 /* This is used for *BOTH* triangular and symmetric Rsparse: */
00043 SEXP tRMatrix_validate(SEXP x)
00044 {
00045     SEXP val = xRMatrix_validate(x);/* checks x slot */
00046     if(isString(val))
00047         return(val);
00048     else {
00049         SEXP
00050             jslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym),
00051             pslot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym);
00052         int uploT = (*uplo_P(x) == 'U'),
00053             k, nnz = length(jslot),
00054             *xj = INTEGER(jslot),
00055             *xi = INTEGER(PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, nnz)));
00056 
00057         expand_cmprPt(length(pslot) - 1, INTEGER(pslot), xi);
00058 
00059         /* Maybe FIXME: ">" should be ">="      for diag = 'U' (uplo = 'U') */
00060         if(uploT) {
00061             for (k = 0; k < nnz; k++)
00062                 if(xi[k] > xj[k]) {
00063                     RETURN(mkString(_("uplo='U' must not have sparse entries in lower diagonal")));
00064                 }
00065         }
00066         else {
00067             for (k = 0; k < nnz; k++)
00068                 if(xi[k] < xj[k]) {
00069                     RETURN(mkString(_("uplo='L' must not have sparse entries in upper diagonal")));
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 
00073         RETURN(ScalarLogical(1));
00074     }
00075 }

00090 int parent_inv_ap(int n, int countDiag, const int pr[], int ap[])
00091 {
00092     int *sz = Alloca(n, int), j;
00093     R_CheckStack();
00094 
00095     for (j = n - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
00096         int parent = pr[j];
00097         sz[j] = (parent < 0) ?  countDiag : (1 + sz[parent]);
00098     }
00099     ap[0] = 0;
00100     for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00101         ap[j+1] = ap[j] + sz[j];
00102     return ap[n];
00103 }
00104 
00113 void parent_inv_ai(int n, int countDiag, const int pr[], int ai[])
00114 {
00115     int j, k, pos = 0;
00116     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00117         if (countDiag) ai[pos++] = j;
00118         for (k = pr[j]; k >= 0; k = pr[k]) ai[pos++] = k;
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 SEXP Parent_inverse(SEXP par, SEXP unitdiag)
00123 {
00124     SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtCMatrix")));
00125     int *ap, *ai, *dims, *pr = INTEGER(par),
00126         countDiag = 1 - asLogical(unitdiag),
00127         j, n = length(par), nnz;
00128     double *ax;
00129 
00130     if (!isInteger(par)) error(_("par argument must be an integer vector"));
00131     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, n + 1));
00132     ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym));
00133     nnz = parent_inv_ap(n, countDiag, pr, ap);
00134     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, nnz));
00135     ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym));
00136     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, nnz));
00137     ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym));
00138     for (j = 0; j < nnz; j++) ax[j] = 1.;
00139     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, allocVector(INTSXP, 2));
00140     dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym));
00141     dims[0] = dims[1] = n;
00142     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString("L"));
00143     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, (countDiag ? mkString("N") : mkString("U")));
00144     parent_inv_ai(n, countDiag, pr, ai);
00145     UNPROTECT(1);
00146     return ans;
00147 }
00148 
00149 SEXP dtCMatrix_solve(SEXP a)
00150 {
00151     SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtCMatrix")));
00152     CSP A = AS_CSP(a);
00153     int *bp = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, (A->n) + 1)),
00154         bnz = 10 * A->n,        /* initial estimate of nnz in b */
00155         lo = uplo_P(a)[0] == 'L', top;
00156     /* These arrays must use Calloc because of possible Realloc */
00157     int *ti = Calloc(bnz, int), p, j, nz, pos = 0;
00158     double *tx = Calloc(bnz, double);
00159     cs *u = cs_spalloc(A->n, 1,1,1,0);  /* Sparse unit vector */
00160     double  *wrk = Alloca(A->n, double);
00161     int *xi = Alloca(2*A->n, int);      /* for cs_reach */
00162     R_CheckStack();
00163 
00164     slot_dup(ans, a, Matrix_DimSym);
00165     SET_DimNames(ans, a);
00166     slot_dup(ans, a, Matrix_uploSym);
00167     slot_dup(ans, a, Matrix_diagSym);
00168     /* initialize the "constant part" of the sparse unit vector */
00169     u->x[0] = 1.;
00170     u->p[0] = 0; u->p[1] = 1;
00171     bp[0] = 0;
00172     for (j = 0; j < A->n; j++) {
00173         u->i[0] = j;                    /* u := j'th unit vector */
00174         /* (wrk[top:n],xi[top:n]) :=  A^{-1} u  : */
00175         top = cs_spsolve (A, u, 0, xi, wrk, 0, lo);
00176         nz = A->n - top;
00177         bp[j + 1] = nz + bp[j];
00178         if (bp[j + 1] > bnz) {
00179             while (bp[j + 1] > bnz) bnz *= 2;
00180             ti = Realloc(ti, bnz, int);
00181             tx = Realloc(tx, bnz, double);
00182         }
00183         if (lo)
00184             for(p = top; p < A->n; p++, pos++) {
00185                 ti[pos] = xi[p];
00186                 tx[pos] = wrk[xi[p]];
00187             }
00188         else /* upper triagonal */
00189             for(p = A->n - 1; p >= top; p--, pos++) {
00190                 ti[pos] = xi[p];
00191                 tx[pos] = wrk[xi[p]];
00192             }
00193     }
00194     nz = bp[A->n];
00195     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP,  nz)), ti, nz);
00196     Memcpy(   REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nz)), tx, nz);
00197 
00198     Free(ti); Free(tx); cs_spfree(u);
00199     UNPROTECT(1);
00200     return ans;
00201 }
00202 
00203 SEXP dtCMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP classed)
00204 {
00205     int cl = asLogical(classed);
00206     SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix")));
00207     CSP A = AS_CSP(a);
00208     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00209         *bdims = INTEGER(cl ? GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimSym) :
00210                          getAttrib(b, R_DimSymbol));
00211     int j, n = bdims[0], nrhs = bdims[1], lo = (*uplo_P(a) == 'L');
00212     double *bx;
00213     R_CheckStack();
00214 
00215     if (*adims != n || nrhs < 1 || *adims < 1 || *adims != adims[1])
00216         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00217     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2)), bdims, 2);
00218     /* FIXME: copy dimnames or Dimnames as well */
00219     bx = Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, n * nrhs)),
00220                 REAL(cl ? GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_xSym):b), n * nrhs);
00221     for (j = 0; j < nrhs; j++)
00222         lo ? cs_lsolve(A, bx + n * j) : cs_usolve(A, bx + n * j);
00223     UNPROTECT(1);
00224     return ans;
00225 }
00226 
00227 SEXP dtCMatrix_upper_solve(SEXP a)
00228 {
00229     SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtCMatrix")));
00230     int lo = uplo_P(a)[0] == 'L', unit = diag_P(a)[0] == 'U',
00231         n = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym))[0],
00232         *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a,Matrix_iSym)),
00233         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_pSym)),
00234         *bp = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, n + 1));
00235     int bnz = 10 * ap[n];         /* initial estimate of nnz in b */
00236     int *ti = Alloca(bnz, int), j, nz;
00237     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), *tx = Alloca(bnz, double),
00238         *tmp = Alloca(n, double);
00239     R_CheckStack();
00240 
00241     if (lo || (!unit))
00242         error(_("Code written for unit upper triangular unit matrices"));
00243     bp[0] = 0;
00244     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00245         int i, i1 = ap[j + 1];
00246         AZERO(tmp, n);
00247         for (i = ap[j]; i < i1; i++) {
00248             int ii = ai[i], k;
00249             if (unit) tmp[ii] -= ax[i];
00250             for (k = bp[ii]; k < bp[ii + 1]; k++) tmp[ti[k]] -= ax[i] * tx[k];
00251         }
00252         for (i = 0, nz = 0; i < n; i++) if (tmp[i]) nz++;
00253         bp[j + 1] = bp[j] + nz;
00254         if (bp[j + 1] > bnz) {
00255             while (bp[j + 1] > bnz) bnz *= 2;
00256             ti = Realloc(ti, bnz, int);
00257             tx = Realloc(tx, bnz, double);
00258         }
00259         i1 = bp[j];
00260         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) if (tmp[i]) {ti[i1] = i; tx[i1] = tmp[i]; i1++;}
00261     }
00262     nz = bp[n];
00263     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, nz)), ti, nz);
00264     Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nz)), tx, nz);
00265     slot_dup(ans, a, Matrix_DimSym);
00266     SET_DimNames(ans, a);
00267     slot_dup(ans, a, Matrix_uploSym);
00268     slot_dup(ans, a, Matrix_diagSym);
00269     UNPROTECT(1);
00270     return ans;
00271 }
